description.en: Premium ensuite renovation in Balwyn featuring book-matched marble-look porcelain feature wall, frameless walk-in shower with linear drain, underfloor heating, full waterproofing, and epoxy grouting throughout.
description.zh: Balwyn高端主卧套间翻新，对纹仿大理石瓷质砖特色墙面、无框步入式淋浴间配线性地漏、地暖系统、全面防水处理，以及全程环氧填缝。
